text: Hi! I cloned a theme and I'm trying to use a global module from the cloned theme in a drag and drop template I'm creating in another branch in the design tools view. The problem is, this module is not available in the "Add..." drop-down menu in the drag and drop template design view. I've checked the "Make available in templates and pages" option in the design view of the module I'm trying to reuse.
Any reason why I'm not able to reuse certain modules, even if checked as "make available"?
